name: ROT-13
author: Ribose
description: ROT-13 command and allows users to react with :unlock: to ROT-13 quickly.
install_msg: Thank you for installing ROT-13. Users may now react with :unlock: to decode ROT-13s immediately, or `[p]rot13` to encode. Configure the settings with `[p]rot13set`. See more with `[p]help rot13`
